alert.note: Alert for Northern Black Hills; Northern Foot Hills; Sturgis, Piedmont Foot Hills (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: High Wind Watch issued March 14 at 1:46AM MDT until March 15 at 9:00AM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM LATE TONIGHT THROUGH WEDNESDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Southwest winds 25 to 40 mph with gusts over 60 mph possible. * WHERE...In South Dakota, the Northern Black Hills, the Northern Foot Hills and the Sturgis/Piedmont Foot Hills. In Wyoming, the Wyoming Black Hills. * WHEN...From late tonight through Wednesday morning. * IMPACTS...The high winds could blow down large trees and damage roofs, small outbuildings, and signs. Power outages are possible. Travel could be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts and warnings for updates on this situation. Fasten loose objects or shelter objects in a safe location prior to the onset of winds.

area.areaDesc: Northern Black Hills; Northern Foot Hills; Sturgis, Piedmont Foot Hills
